LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.label: butcher creature
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.description: Butcher a creature to obtain its meat, leather, and other body products.
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseMechanoid.label: disassemble mechanoid
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseMechanoid.description: Disassemble a dead mechanoid into its component parts.
